overview: Dying Under Your Eyes explores the sudden death of Ashery’s elderly father in 2018, focusing on ageing, dying, mourning and intimate surveillance. Merging depictions of everyday life with symbolic undertones, the film explores end of life care, ageing and intergenerational dynamics. It incorporates diaristic footage shot on the artist’s smartphone over the last seven years of her father’s life, alongside constructed scenes with apparitional figures [eFlux].
title: Dying Under Your Eyes
